Quickstrike:




Quickstrike nodded to Black Arachnia. He put her on the lab table and 
bolted off into the hallway. He ran down the corridors, searching for 
the dock. He wasn't used to this base. He hadn't spent time on 
exploring the many corridors and doorways.

But Thank Primus, he did find the dock Black Arachnia told him. He 
looked around, and at an corner of the room was the pod. He walked 
over to it and tore the web from it. He shoved it towards the door 
and managed to get it out the hallway. He frowned to himself a 
little. Getting this to back to the lab room wasn't going to be easy, 
but Black Arachnia's life was at danger. 

He was strong so, he thought he could manage it to it. He transformed 
to beast mode and used his large claws to push it to the lab room 
where Black Arachnia was. 

He grumbled a little getting into the room.  He shoved it near the 
table where she was and transformed back to robot. 

What was next?

The spark transfer. He looked around. 

"Okay, okay." he said to himself, searching for what he could use. He 
found a few wires, and even a compartment that would be perfect for 
holding the spark. 

He gathered the supplies up and walked back to Black Arachnia.

"Ah think yer gonna have t' help. Ah don't know what t' do." He 
placed the compartment on the table beside her. "How am ah gonna get 
t' th' spark?"
